page.title: 11Clubs
page.content:
Clubs
Ilford has many clubs. In some you have to pay to get in. On Ley Street there is a club called New World Snooker. There are some cricket clubs in Ilford that cater for all ages. There are a lot of Youth Clubs, some of which you can join at eleven. Ilford also has some Karate Clubs, catering for all ages and a new club called Apples that offers saunas, gymnasia, dance and keep fit facilities. Redbridge Sports Centre offers the opportunity to play a wide variety of sports for people of all ages. Badminton is very popular here. In these types of clubs you have to pay to use the facilites but they are very popular. Two youth organisations active in Ilford are the Girl Guides and Boy Scouts movements.
